snippet: The automaker could face damaging lawsuits after a major recall. Also on the Minute, diplomatic efforts ahead of the Crimean referendum vote, and Senator McConnell’s re-election fight.
abstract: The automaker could face damaging lawsuits after a major recall. Also on the Minute, diplomatic efforts ahead of the Crimean referendum vote, and Senator McConnell’s re-election fight.

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
